name: World Series of Poker – WSOP Free Texas Holdem
name_original: World Series of Poker – WSOP Free Texas Holdem
description:
Play the official World Series of Poker game to win your own virtual WSOP Bracelet!

One of the most prestigious poker brands raises the stakes with an authentic experience. Compete to win the ultimate prize in poker! Do you have what it takes to become a champion?

Key Features of World Series of Poker:
● Free poker chips every 4 hours: Claim your free chips to enjoy Texas Hold’em Poker to the fullest!
● WSOP Bracelets: Fill up your Collectors’ Chip collections & win the most prestigious prize in Texas Hold’em and Omaha Poker; the WSOP Bracelet.
● Texas Hold’em Tournaments: Win multi-level Texas Hold’em tournaments to earn WSOP rings and climb the poker leaderboard! What’s more fun than being #1?
● Exclusive events: Return daily to World Series of Poker to experience new poker game modes, free chip events and more, for FREE!
● WSOP CLUBS: Test your Texas Holdem Poker skills to earn your place in exclusive clubs and get elite benefits. Will you become a part of poker royalty?
● Poker Recall: Challenge your memory and Texas Holdem Poker skills in our mini-game to win huge jackpots!
● Poker statistics: Improve your game with the most extensive stats’ tracking in any Texas Holdem Poker game!
● Texas Hold’em or Omaha: Your choice! Crush the tables and become the poker king of Texas Holdem & Omaha Poker!
● Missions: Stay on top of your poker game with daily and weekly missions!
● Play live with friends: Invite your friends to play Texas Holdem and make it a poker night anytime, anywhere.
● Continuous play: Start playing Texas Holdem or Omaha Poker on your phone or tablet and continue on PlayWSOP.com or Facebook with the same bankroll.
● Guest mode: Rock the tables and play Texas Hold’em or Omaha anonymously. Don’t be afraid to bluff!
● Facebook connect bonus: Boost your bankroll with $250,000 additional chips when you connect your account to Facebook. Start your journey to become a World Series of Poker star!
● Slots mini-game: Spin and win chips in between poker hands with our casino slot machine.

WE’D LOVE YOUR FEEDBACK!
Connect with us on Facebook (http://bit.ly/WSOP_Fanpage) and on Twitter (http://bit.ly/TwitterWSOP).

Call information is required to provide you with the ultimate customer support!
This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
This product does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
